title: Added device type to touch events (touch, mouse, pen)
body:
**Description of Change**

Added motion event tool type to touch device type mappings
**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1186

**API Changes**

None

**Behavioral Changes**
Touch events will now be the correct type: touch, pen, mouse.  Previously they were all touch.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
